post.body: yeah.... except it's become a "regular thing" lately...
I agree!! Especially Extra Light or Extra Bold
I think I need one!
oh noes!! who?!
woo hoo!
Overdraft fee for being 1 cent over??? wtf?
Oh my goodness.... FINALLY home for the night... and wondering how the Boy did on his linear algebra final.
getting antsy to leave before the storm rolls in...
Jsut had to cut 12 pages from the mag..... arrrrrrrrrrrgh...
not very excited for the commute tomorrow morning.... oye!
some days I really don't mind working in bed....
Home too late to stay up and work on presents tonight.... they're going to have to wait. I'm exhausted!
Drivng around Provo with my guy passed out in the passenger seat. Poor thing.
quickie date tonight with the Boy - in the middle of finals. How do I rate??
Mmm.... bed finally...
Only one more box to cross out on my editorial sheet!!
woo - more snow!!
Chuck time is sacred... don't call during it unless you just want me to say, "uh huh... uh huh..." the entire time.
ooohhhh I'm pissed beyond all reason. Why can't people clean up after themselves?!?!???
three hats done... about 9 more to go... oye!
I sure love my guy.
man. I'm getting too old for almost-all-nighters
my room's still a mess... but I'm feeling better about it... it's not getting any more special attention. I have to work LOTS next week!
still trying to get bedrooms switched.... oye!
Switching rooms today. Excited and overwhelmed by how much stuff I have!!
just got home... why do I do this???
Date night! New phone and Quantum of Solace!
ugh.... I didn't even make it to midnight and I feel yucky this morning.
werkin' on new years eve.... if I can focus...
wow.... up way early.. and it feels good!
holy million updates @wasatchwoman... pushed everyone off the page. :-P
I've gotta start getting up earlier and working out 'with' the Boy.... bed is so nice though....
grocery shopping makes me sad. boo for spending money on "essentials"!!
Gramps says he's gonna haul those pilgrims back East if they don't get out and help cut the grass. No more John Wayne for him!
didn't get to the Gateway tonight.. or do ANY shopping... but I DID get a website done AND get to make dinner for the Boy. woo!
Still have half a driveway to shovel... holy cow we came home to a lot of white stuff!
snowed into brigham for the night... it's so pretty outside!
mmm.... curled up watching movies and hanging out... so nice to just enjoy things. :)
Out all afternoon for last minute stuff... still have gifts to wrap before heading "home" before the big storm hits tomorrow.
bored.
